message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a high-value product that I believe you'll find extremely valuable. I'm open to discussing the price, but I'm starting with a price of $14000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. Can you meet me halfway and consider this price?

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit on this deal. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13250. This is my final offer, so I'd appreciate it if you could make a decision soon.
I understand that you need to make a profit, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
